ai-atk-s0103a5:46_6: When they know that your speech is true,
ai-atk-s0103a5:46_7: He is not doing what is unsuitable,
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_0: But those ascetics and brahmins get care for ascetics and brahmins,
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_1: Is there a thing that is called ‘the self’ that is eternal’ or ‘the cosmos is eternal’ or ‘the cosmos is finite’?”
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_2: And when I say that you say this: “This is the only truth, what I don’t know.”
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_5: that is, namely, this is the designation of the determination.
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_6: There is nothing more than me here.
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_7: Herein, this is what is said: “He is well proclaimed, what is both designated and what is on the meaning.”
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_8: For the breaking of the schism is there, what is there is what is reckoned as an instance.
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_9: Herein, there is designation of the views:
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_10: the designation of the dealings: the designation of the sense-spheres, the designation of the faculties, the designation of the sense-spheres, and the designation of the sense-spheres is called “the designation of the truths”.
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_11: “It’s when there is a designation of label and description, and there is what is known as ‘perception’.
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_12: for the Buddha is wise also because he has not overpowered the supreme terms of the supreme knowledge and conduct.
ai-atk-s0103a5:47_13: “I’m the one who is superior when it comes to the higher exposition.”
ai-atk-s0103a5:48_2: If you do it when you’ve taught it,
ai-atk-s0103a5:48_4: For when there is mindfulness of breathing in all things, it is proper to get dropped on all sides, and it is not held in complete in all good things that have been seen and considered as “on as a hundred man enemy”.
ai-atk-s0103a5:48_6: I have taught and pointed out the four kinds of mindfulness meditation for giving up and going beyond all these four kinds of mindfulness meditation.”
